column2:
'and cloud. We also recommend using MLflow for tracking and model logging. See the'
'MLflow concept article for details.'
'Production model deployment'
'We recommend v2 for production model deployment. Managed endpoints astract the'
'IT overhead and provide a performant solution for deploying and scoring models, oth'
'for online (near real-time) and atch (massively parallel) scenarios.'
'Kuernetes deployments are supported in v2 through AKS or Azure Arc, enaling Azure'
'cloud and on-premises deployments managed y your organization.'
